btc_pk_hex.description: btc_pk_hex is the Bitcoin secp256k1 PK of the BTC delegator. The PK follows encoding in BIP-340 spec in hex format

covenant_sigs.description: covenant_sigs is a list of adaptor signatures on the slashing tx by each covenant member. It will be a part of the witness for the staking tx output.

delegator_slashing_sig.description: delegator_slashing_sig is the signature on the slashing tx by the delegator (i.e. SK corresponding to btc_pk) as string hex. It will be a part of the witness for the staking tx output.

end_height.description: end_height is the end height of the BTC delegation it is the end BTC height of the time-lock - w

fp_btc_pk_list.description: fp_btc_pk_list is the list of BIP-340 PKs of the finality providers that this BTC delegation delegates to

params_version.description: params version used to validate the delegation

slashed.description: slashed is used to indicate whether a given delegation is related to a slashed FP

staker_addr.description: staker_addr is the address to receive rewards from BTC delegation

staking_output_idx.description: staking_output_idx is the index of the staking output in the staking tx

start_height.description: start_height is the start BTC height of the BTC delegation. It is the start BTC height of the time-lock

total_sat.description: total_sat is the total BTC stakes in this delegation, quantified in satoshi

unbonding_time.description: unbonding_time is used in unbonding output time-lock path and in slashing transactions change outputs

undelegation_info.description: undelegation_info is the undelegation info of this delegation.

covenant_slashing_sigs.description: covenant_slashing_sigs is a list of adaptor signatures on the unbonding slashing tx by each covenant member It will be a part of the witness for the staking tx output.

covenant_unbonding_sig_list.description: covenant_unbonding_sig_list is the list of signatures on the unbonding tx by covenant members

delegator_slashing_sig.description: delegator_slashing_sig is the signature on the slashing tx by the delegator (i.e. SK corresponding to btc_pk). It will be a part of the witness for the unbonding tx output.

delegator_unbonding_sig.description: delegator_unbonding_sig is the signature on the unbonding tx by the delegator (i.e. SK corresponding to btc_pk). It effectively proves that the delegator wants to unbond and thus Babylon will consider this BTC delegation unbonded. Delegator's BTC on Bitcoin will be unbonded after time-lock.

slashing_tx.description: slashing_tx is the unbonding slashing tx

unbonding_tx.description: unbonding_tx is the transaction which will transfer the funds from staking output to unbonding output. Unbonding output will usually have lower timelock than staking output.

adaptor_sigs.description: adaptor_sigs is a list of adaptor signatures, each encrypted by a restaked BTC finality provider's public key

cov_pk.description: cov_pk is the public key of the covenant emulator, used as the public key of the adaptor signature
